channel.title: Docker on credibleDEV
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on credibleDEV

item.title: Install Docker and Portainer on Proxmox
item.description: Learn how to install Docker on Proxmox and use Portainer to easily manager your Docker instance and containers.

item.title: Mac OSX on Manjaro Linux Made Easy With Docker
item.description: You can run macOS on Manjaro and other Linux distributions easily with Docker for testing and development work.

item.title: Setup Docker on Manjaro Linux
item.description: Installing Docker on Manjaro Linux and other Arch based distros is pretty simple. This quick guide will help you setup and use Docker.
